name: music-desktop-ui
description: Control a music player from your Mac desktop
author: Robbert Broersma

scripts.build: mkdir -p tmp/ build/ img/generated/; node build-icon.js; electron-icon-maker --input=tmp/icon.png --output=tmp/; mv tmp/icons/png/16x16.png img/generated/; mv tmp/icons/mac/icon.icns build/
